ygData.subject: Re: Wee!
ygData.msgSnippet: if someone takes my name I just add a letter or replace a letter... like if it ends with r add another r or replace b with an h z d or something then if I run
ygData.messageBody:
if someone takes my name I just add a letter or replace a letter... like if
it ends with r add another r
or replace b with an h z d or something then if I run into the guy with my
name..... hehe thats his prob he stole my beta name

----- Original Message -----
From: Avron Vallengard <avron@...>
To: EverQuest <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 11:47 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Wee!


> From: Avron Vallengard <avron@...>
>
>
> Yay! Finally got my copy of EverQuest.. :)
> So now I'm not so bummed out anymore.. Just got one problem now..
> Someone has taken the name Avron on Fennin Ro.. hehe.. I don't know if you
> think that matters but to me it does, I've used Avron for years and now
> when I have been waiting for EverQuest the past weeks I have written a
> detailed characteristics/history for the character too.. So heh..
> Anyways I will try to think up a new name.. But expect to see me out there
> on Fennin Ro.. :)
>
> - Avron -
>
>
>
